Package domain

Class Mode

  • java.lang.Object
    • domain.Mode
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    NormalMode, Timed, TimeTrial
    public abstract class Mode
extends java.lang.Object
    An abstract class representing a game mode in Quoridor. It implements the Serializable interface.
    Since:
    25-05-2023
